Posts.Content: Kkeden wrote: I had DCIS last year and then a bilateral mastectomy as I am BRCA2. For the past 2 months I’ve noticed an enlarged node in my neck. My oncologist looked at it last week and wants to remove it. Has anyone experienced a recurrence similar to this or a new cancer starting in the node? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Enlarged node in neck Kkeden Kkeden

Posts.Content: Kkeden wrote: I have had a bilateral mastectomy due to DCIS and BRCA2 positive. I have noticed a lump under the skin but not attached to the skin. It’s smooth and fairly round shaped. It does not move. I am sure it’s a cyst but would like to know what a cyst feels like as I’ve never had one before. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What does a cyst feel like compared to a cancerous mass? Kkeden Kkeden

Posts.Content: Jun 14, 2018 02:08AM Kkeden wrote: Thank you for responding. I have contacted my surgeon and he wants to do a round of antibiotic first. Woukd a recurrent tumor need to be fixed to the skin? I can pull my skin up off of it. Wouldn’t there just be alloderm underneath my skin? A tumor can’t grow in alloderm can it?
Posts.Title: What does a cyst feel like compared to a cancerous mass? Kkeden Kkeden

Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2018 07:14PM Kkeden wrote: I have been dealing with the same thug and have also described it as feeling like a blister. Did you find anything out on this?
